tweet.html: RT @CatholicUHist: We are saddened to announce the death of our former colleague, Harold D. Langley (1925-2020). In addition to teaching here at @CatholicUniv, Harry's distinguished career included positions at @librarycongress, @HistoryAtState, and @amhistorymuseum. history.catholic.edu/news-events/20…
